/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The buildings are punctuated by patches of greenery, adding a touch of nature to the concrete landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
